newsitem.title: BELGIUM: AEA says cargo rises on most routes in Jan-Jun '97.
newsitem.headline: AEA says cargo rises on most routes in Jan-Jun '97.

text.p: Association of European Airlines (AEA) cargo figures for first half 1997 show increases in all sectors with the exception of Europe-Sub Saharan African trade which fell 3.2 percent to 903.6 million revenue freight tonne likometres (RFTK).
Overall international traffic volumes increased by 3.5 percent on the first six months of 1996, rising to 11,839.7 million revenue tonne freight kms(RFTKs).
The Mid Atlantic and Europe-North Africa and Middle East sectors were the two sectors that saw the strongest growth.
*These figures relate to the international scheduled services of AEA member airlines.
